name: Cable Management (WhySoup)
description:
- GMTK Gamejam 2021 Submission by WhySoup and GreenClonk -

Connect cables and jump through portals to traverse various levels.

Keyboard:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Left Shift to jump
  • Hold spacebar to pick up cables

 Controller:

  • Use left stick to move
  • Bumpers to jump
  • Hold triggers to pick up cables
